suppress.comment: removing rows containing values along the following ICD9CM and ICD10CM parent codes using a lookup table for all concept_ids to be suppressed for condition_source_concept_id
suppress.on: exists (select * from `:idataset.condition_occurrence` as record2 where condition_occurrence.condition_occurrence_id = record2.condition_occurrence_id and condition_source_concept_id in (select concept_id from `:idataset.concept_ids_suppression`))

suppress.comment: removing rows containing values along the following ICD9CM and ICD10CM parent codes using a lookup table for all concept_ids to be suppressed for condition_concept_id
suppress.on: exists (select * from `:idataset.condition_occurrence` as record2 where condition_occurrence.condition_occurrence_id = record2.condition_occurrence_id and condition_concept_id in (select concept_id from `:idataset.concept_ids_suppression`))

suppress.comment: removing rows containing values along the following ICD9CM and ICD10CM parent codes using a lookup table for all concept_ids to be suppressed for condition_type_concept_id
suppress.on: exists (select * from `:idataset.condition_occurrence` as record2 where condition_occurrence.condition_occurrence_id = record2.condition_occurrence_id and condition_type_concept_id in (select concept_id from `:idataset.concept_ids_suppression`))

suppress.comment: removing rows containing values along the following ICD9CM and ICD10CM parent codes using a lookup table for all concept_ids to be suppressed for condition_status_concept_id
suppress.on: exists (select * from `:idataset.condition_occurrence` as record2 where condition_occurrence.condition_occurrence_id = record2.condition_occurrence_id and condition_status_concept_id in (select concept_id from `:idataset.concept_ids_suppression`))
